title: Epidemic Watcher
desc: Application capable of registering patients with epidemic diseases and displaying the records on a world map. Using AI, models are generated to predict the growth of the disease. Available in web and mobile devices

title: Maxii
desc: Android application to search for movies, series, anime and actors, ratings and grade them using TheMovieDB API

title: Banco Mercantíl de México (no real organization)
desc: Using servlets, html, css, js, an application with the actions of a bank. Create account, transfers, check balances, check accounts, all this with static information in json
